scripts.build: babel app --out-dir build --source-maps inline --copy-files && mv build/bin/www.js build/bin/www
scripts.wbuild: babel app --out-dir build --source-maps inline --copy-files && rename build\bin\www.js www
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.wclean:build: npm run wclean && npm run wbuild
scripts.clean:start: npm run clean && npm run build && NODE_ENV=local nodemon --ignore apidoc/ ./build/bin/www
scripts.wclean:start: npm run wclean && npm run wbuild && SET "NODE_ENV=local" && nodemon --ignore apidoc/ ./build/bin/www
scripts.start: npm run clean:start && NODE_ENV=local nodemon --exec babel-node --ignore apidoc/ -- ./buil/bin/www.js
